text: agar tum ne acche kaam kiye to khud apne hee fayde ke liye aur agar tum ne buraiyya ki, to bhi apne hee liye, phir jab dosre waade ka waqt aaya (to hum ne dosre bandho ko bhej diya ta ke) wo tumhaare chehre bigaad de, aur pehli dafa ki tarah phir osi masjid mein ghus jaaye aur jis jis cheez par qaabo paaye tood phood kar jad se uqaad de
